title: 360° VR-Based Social Field Simulation Education: Immersive Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Microlearning Modules Incorporating Interactive Elements, Utilizing 360° Video and Mobile Devices to Experience Real-World Social Contexts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community conflict situations in a 360° VR environment and propose solutions with 80% accuracy.
Learners perform social decision-making simulations at least three times through 5–15-minute 360° educational content.
Learners achieve a score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale for field response capabilities in VR-based assessment scenarios.

resources: LMS Platform with Embedded Interactive Elements

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
